instruction: Please explain how risk analytics can be integrated into the investment process and why it is important, particularly during times of crisis.
output: Risk analytics can be used in multiple areas of the investment process, such as trading and strategy development. By utilizing a consistent quantitative framework for decision-making, investors can better understand and manage their risks. During times of crisis, risk analytics can be particularly important in helping investors make informed decisions by providing real-time data analysis and identifying potential risks and opportunities. Overall, incorporating risk analytics into the investment process can lead to better investment decisions and ultimately improve the performance of investment portfolios.
